title: Mourning Grey
description: When Cassandra finds out that it's her destiny to destroy the last of the vampires, she vows to find another way to end the animosity between humans and the ancient race, and prevent the next war from happeningWhen finds out there is more to the story, Cassandra is thrown into a world of horror and magic, and love and hate, and into a forbidden love that she fights for; can she bring her enemy, Lharkin, out of the dark and back into the light?The game between Dark and Light begins in this first book of the Empians Pantheon trilogy.
author: Marie Montine
